member.name: M:FiddlerCore.Utilities.StringHelper.TrimBeforeLast(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the "Tail" of a string, after (but not including) the Last instance of specified delimiter.
member.param: The delimiting character after which text should be returned.
member.returns: Part of a string after (but not including) the final chDelim, or the full string if chDelim was not found.
